text:
It seems that in the file ant.bat some '%'s are missing.This results in the 
impossibility to launch the bat,as some environment parameters' names are 
actually viewed as contant strings.
creator: mic.sca@gmail.com
stevel@apache.org
text:
Somethings amiss here, because it appears to work for most people, myself included.

-can you comment out the @echo off at the top of the file, and do a run through
without anything being hidden ... post up the output here along with some more
info on where its going wrong.

-can you also post the output of the DOS "SET" command?
